item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi everyone I’m Gabriele [aka StealthGuy] and I’m from üáÆüáπ. At the moment I’m a CS student. I spend all my free time messing around with 0s and 1s. I really like starting many projects, and sometimes I finish them too. Too often I ask myself, “How did I do that?” so here is a collection of notes I take every day about things I’ve learned and applied. ‚ÑπÔ∏è Se sei di fretta, puoi leggere solo i titoli dei paragrafi… Scrivere Scrivere √® una delle attivit√† che trovo pi√π rilassanti e piacevoli.
